content: the double_crochet all day rectangle blanket is a free crochet pattern on my blog this double_crochet rectangle blanket is worked from the center out in the round with an easy to memorize one round repeat starts with a row of single_crochet stitches to create stability in the center of your crochet blanket once the foundation single_crochet row is complete the remainder of the rectangle blanket is made with all double_crochet stitches + chains for the four corners worked in non-turning rounds an easy one round repeat that is easy to memorize pattern includes instructions for 4 different sizes baby lapghan twin & queen sizes i have a tutorial for how to resize your blanket to any size as well i have a complete video tutorial to show you how to work the blanket as well as how to change colors the ad-free pdf includes a stitch diagram
